website_summaries.verdict: A superior choice from a reputable maker that will enhance your bedroom and your sleep.
pros: The silk is more dense (25mm) than others of comparable price
cons: More expensive than some other choices, and the pillowcases are known to wrinkle

customer_reviews.title: very nice at first
customer_reviews.text: Silk is delicate which I knew but they definitely stain very easily and it is very tough to get out anything even if you catch the stain early. Definitely scrub your face and eyes well before sleeping and be careful with the lotion you wear after. They already look dingy to me even after babying them but that was my own fault for getting a light color.They do feel soft though to sleep on !
customer_reviews.author: Erin T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best by any means, but they are OK. I own many pure mulberry silk products and these pillowcases are not even in the same ballpark. Very thin and not as soft as better quality mulberry silk. I use these Fisher's pillowcases when I travel, because I don't worry if I lose them.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a few satin pillow cases and this blue one from Fisher's Finery is beautiful. The quality of the silk, the thickness and the saturated color devine. I machine washed on delicate in a bag hung on line to dry, looks like I ironed it. (I wash on breezy days so I can line dry). Will purchase more. I have all king sizes.
customer_reviews.author: djc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: After about six months & handwashing both pillow cases litarly come apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Silk
customer_reviews.text: I bought a silk pillowcase that appears to be the nicest one I’ve ever purchased . It is large enough and very soft . Haven’t used it long enough to discuss durability but I can see that it is very well made .
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned that the quality wouldn't be great but it's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my toddler to help protect her curly hair at night. I was concerned that the quality wouldn't be great but it's wonderful. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrard Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillowcases! The best quality silk pillowcases I've ever used. The 25MM and 30MM weights are perfect - and wash like a dream. Have already ordered more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Burriss

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Ordered light blue and took it out ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Ordered light blue and took it out of the package and noticed bleached out marks from where it had been folded. For the price it will need to go back now.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan S

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The expression, 'Smooth as Silk', must be based on Fishers Finery 100% Pure Silk 25 mm pillowcase - it can't be any better than this. It looks great and feels great - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Garthune

customer_reviews.title: super silk
customer_reviews.text: it is what is says it is -- a super silk pillow case -- thank you
customer_reviews.author: judith asphar

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow cases. I have noticed that when I wake up in the morning my hair is not frizzy, due to my tossing and turning.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice silk, but arrived faded. No finery here!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like the feel of silk on my face when I sleep and because it is gentle on my hair, helping to prevent split ends and maintain the hair style. The silk was good heavy-weight quality and the order came quickly, but the silk pillowcase had very distinct fade marks along the fold lines!!! It looked as if it had sat in its packaging in a sunny window for a year or two. This was very disappointing. I would never display it on my bed. It will be used for travel only (to cover the hotel pillowcases).
customer_reviews.author: Michele K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Absolutely the best sllk pillowcase I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: Thick, supple, soft & exquisitely made. Light blue is powdery slate in tint, (which coordinates well with the Barbara Barry line of bedding). Definitely improves sleep. Amazing quality at an amazing price. Product came super fast with Prime! Thank you Fishers Finery & Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: In the finer description, you say it's charmeuse
customer_reviews.text: So is it made out of mulberry or charmeuse silk? In the title description, you say it's mulberry. In the finer description, you say it's charmeuse. They say charmeuse can be replicated by using a lookalike, polyester. I think polyester charmeuse is what I bought here is what I'm getting to. A knockoff, if you will. It was comfortable somewhat.... but I knew I had felt this material before. Me and my girlfriend woke up with messed up hair and that's not what mulberry or true charmeuse silk is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: High vibe sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am in love. I have been meaning to buy a silk pillowcases for wrinkles and hair years ago. I did a quick search on how it choose one and came across an article from good housekeeping. Since they are trusted and recommended this I bought it. I am so glad I did. It feels magical and high vibe. Every time I lay on it I feel amazing. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Silk is nice
customer_reviews.text: Been sleeping on this for a long time now, and its held up well. Regular washings in the washer, no special treatment. Im sure the silk would be silkier with woolite in a sink, but meh. Its good.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Mirkovich

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow case is keeping my hair from breaking and my skin from being wrinkled! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sally W

customer_reviews.title: My hair does not get crunched and my facial skin looks as good in the morning when I get up as when ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used a silk pillow cover for many years. My hair does not get crunched and my facial skin looks as good in the morning when I get up as when I go to bed. This pillow cover is the best and most durable of any that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gailhhi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, not as thin as my other silk case - which is a great thing! I wash in the machine, but I line dry it most often.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product - heavy weight silk, nicely stitched seams. Arrived within 2 days. These pillow cases are much nicer quality and half the price of similar products I was looking at in high end department stores. Ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality silk
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased other name brands that cost around 150.00 per pillow case, these are very good quality for there price, I will purchase these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely quality silk pillow case which feels luxurious against my skin. No more sheet wrinkles on my face or messy morning hair!
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Fits the pillow perfect!! I wash in a garment bag on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pillow perfect!! I wash in a garment bag on gentle and hang on towel rack to dry and it comes out great each time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me and my hair. Keeps my hair healthy and neat. No more breakages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference in sleep quality and pillow comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent who knew something as simple as changing to a high quality silk pillow case would improve comfort and quality of sleep and actually make you wake up the morning more refreshed. These pillow cases are all we use now and I’m sure will find their way into our suitcase whenever we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Moti Vator

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice
customer_reviews.text: You cant put a price on a good night sleep. Not saying these are expensive but having not slept on silk i thought I'd try it out. Super soft and cool. Seems like decent quality. No regrets buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week and it split at the seam. Also see defective section in material nearby. Not worth the price. Obviously I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: saint67

customer_reviews.title: Seams ripped
customer_reviews.text: The seams ripped after using it for a couple of months. I was very gentle with it and only hand washed it as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Okay I did the research for you and this is a great price for quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was all set to purchase a pricey silk pillowcase from a pricey website but their checkout was not working. Since I was desperate for a new one (mine were all in tatters), I came to trusty Amazon to find one. This is amazing and is as good, nay better, than any other silk pillowcases I have every purchased and I have been using silk pillowcases for years. They were recommended to me by a hairdresser to lessen hair damage. Did I mention this was half the price of the pricey one I was close to purchasing? Easy care too. I just throw it in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Chakra44

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t compare to the Silk
customer_reviews.text: This is pillowcase is okay, and I probably wouldn’t be so critical of it if I hadn’t purchased the Silk pillowcase to compare it to. I read many reviews here that said that this pillowcase is just as good as it’s more expensive counterpart...and I wish that were true, but it’s not. I noticed a small difference in the quality of my hair with this case (less oily and creased in the morning) but never a huge difference in how my face felt or looked. The difference with the Silk is incredible. Skip this cheaper option (especially if you have fine, delicate hair) and buy the Silk - you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I had this pillow case for three weeks and the seams starting coming apart and I have a giant hole. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: I wash the pillowcase weekly in a mesh bag during the delicate cycle and hang to dry. After the last time I washed it, it developed tears around the envelope that folds over the end of the pillow. It's a queen sized case on a queen sized pillow and so it's not a case of over stuffing the pillow case. I'm going to try to mend it but I'm concerned it will disintegrate further. Super disappointed as I've only had it since April 1st.
customer_reviews.author: RobinH

customer_reviews.title: Terrible after washing!!
customer_reviews.text: After washing its terrible fabric! Hard and scratchy! I bought my husband one from another company and have washed it several times and feels wonderful but they didn't have king size. Sorry I purchased this expensive pillow case!
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: Tear in seam after 2 washes
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there wasn’t a zipper the queen size accommodated my queen size pillow nicely After 2 hand wash cycles in a lingerie bag with cold water and woolite there was a 3” tear on a seam Ridiculous for a $50. pillowcase!!!
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN P

customer_reviews.title: Threads coming undone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second silk pillowcase. This one is better than my first, as it’s softer. But after a month of use the fabric/silk threads are coming undone. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: REBA

customer_reviews.title: *LOVE!*
customer_reviews.text: Quickly I've become a fan of Fishers FInery. Hands down this is the nicest pillowcase I've ever slept on and I can't recommend it enough. I've tried lots of other brands and styles, including copper infused, and this is the winner. Worth every penny. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Critic

customer_reviews.title: very cheaply made on the first wash the sides unravel ...
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made on the first wash the sides unravel, since it was a gift I had to purchase else where. very bad
customer_reviews.author: Ted Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how it feels, but quality of material is poorer than poore, afer three nights of sleeping on it came few holes in the middle of the pillow case. Bought a half price cheaper from the another company which is much better. My mistake, I thought more pricey much better oh well, I changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seams rip out after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pillowcase at first. I’ve only had it a few weeks and the seams are ripping out. I’ve treated it with care. At this price, I’m very disappointed. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silk Pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased one of these YEARS ago. I love it. I don't wake up with huge wrinkles in my face on the side I sleep on anymore, my hair doesn't break off as much (long) and I sleep so well. I would recommend silk pillowcases to everyone. And it feels so wonderful when you lay your head on it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Glassel

customer_reviews.title: Worst pillowcases......unusable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pillowcases because they were recommended by GOOD HOUSEKEEPING. WORST SILK PILLOWCASES I ever had. They don’t fold over the pillow. Flap keeps opening They should have a zipper. Will never buy anything recommended by GOOD HOUSE KEEPING. SHOULD GET A REFUND
customer_reviews.author: karen roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, fairly nice feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pillow case. The color is very nice. It is a bit small for my standard pillow. Once I washed it, the flap never closed again. I wash it in my washer on handwash and use baby shampoo. It is has a few pills and pulls after several months and I do not wash it with anything else. It stays fairly cool at night. It keeps my hair a little nicer, but not much. It is silk, but not great silk. For the price, it is an OK purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is incredible. Expensive for a pillowcase...but you get what you pay for and it’s worth it. So soft and feels great under my face. Stay on my pillow for the most part but the pocket could go a little deeper which would help hold the pillow in more. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with these for about 4 years (purchased 7 as I change cases daily). However, in recent weeks they've started to rip...get holes, and I suspect they'll all need to be thrown out in the coming weeks. Much better than the silk pillowcases I had previously....which lasted for a significantly shorter period. However, given than these are now almost $15 more than when I originally, purchased, I'll see if there are any lesser priced items of comparable quality now available. Also, I tried to order a few of these last season, and noticed the sizing is now off (king too big and queen too small)....so these may no longer be viable anyways for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: fashionista

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Very soft and wash up pretty well! I wash on delicate in mesh bag and then dry in dryer on lowest heat- they don’t come out completely wrinkle free, but overall I’m very pleased. I tried two different brands and ended up ordering 3 of these as liked quality of this one best.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A Courter

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else.
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is nice, but stains very quickly and easily, and honestly I had no idea where the stains came from. I washed it and new stains suddenly appeared....frankly it’s just not worth the cost and care (requires hand washing). It also wrinkles very easily. Yes, my skin and care looked nice, but I would rather spend the money for something of equal or better quality. It’s a nice pillowcase, but I later ordered a set of 2 satin pillowcases for $10 and I’ve been far happier. I would suggest going that route instead.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pillowcase! Being 60+ it really makes a difference sleeping on silk vs. cotton. I haven't woken up with wrinkles on my face (that take hours to go away due to my age) since I started using silk. I had a 19mm silk case before but elected to go with the 25mm as it's supposed to hold up better, last longer, and be more luxurious which I concur. It's much heavier than the 19mmas it's supposed to be. I wasn't sure if it wold be that noticeable but it is. I was originally reluctant to spend this much money but after having slept on it for a while now, I feel it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Ordinary Pillowcases Just Aren't the Same
customer_reviews.text: Was using low thread count polyester or some such cheap fabric pillowcases before and they did the job but this like resting my head on a cloud. It's super comfy, seems durable, and I'm sure the wrinkles will come out from a few washes. Have only had this pillowcase for a day but it's made a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: David Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: When washed, it does wrinkle but still smooth to touch. The flaps that secure the ends are a little bothersome. In comparison to another brand of silk pillow case that I have, I would give this one a three on a scale from 1-5.
customer_reviews.author: Dgc

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: I really see a difference in my hair with this pillow case. My hairdresser kept telling me to get a silk pillowcase but I really didn’t want to spend the money. This one is reasonably priced. I would recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Tbrown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality silk pillowcases!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful pillow cases, the quality is superb! I have a total of four, and I would defiantly buy more. They launder well in a laundry bag, and I hang them to dry. No fading has occurred. A light steaming after they have dried makes them look gorgeous! ( I iron all of my pillowcases) I hope that these pillowcases continue to be sold by Amazon forever! A wonderful product and the price is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: s.c.moore

customer_reviews.title: Gross pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: Not silk as I know it and they wrinkle badly and I would not buy these pillow cases. Too Large and not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Slugger11

customer_reviews.title: Great price and feels good to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillowcase because I don't wake up with my hair all tangled. I'm growing out my hair (it's currently a chin-length bob) and want it to stay healthy, which is why I bought this pillowcase. When I wake up, my hair is not tangled. Sometimes, it looks just like it did when I went to sleep! Pillowcase is easy to wash, love it.
customer_reviews.author: celiza

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected. No change in hair/skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these pillow cases in hopes of finding a cheaper option than the bigger brands selling their silk pillowcases for $70-80each. I‘m disappointed to say that I do not notice much of a difference with my skin or hair. They’re comfortable which is why i rated a two, but i probably would not have spent the money if i knew there would be no improvements/change. I’m not a silk expert, but to me they do not feel as silky as other brands I’ve felt from friends. Kinda wish i would have went the more expensive route since other brands are said to be made for hair/skin improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Atalie Getz

customer_reviews.title: Best silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I felt comfortable ordering this even though it is kind of pricey because it has the Good Housekeeping seal. This is the best pillowcase, real silk not satin like some pillowcases. It's very smooth and soft but not too "slippery"; just right. It keeps my long hair from getting tangled overnight. It also seems to keep my overnight retinol and moisturizer on my face and not on the case. I`ve been washing it in a wash bag with my delicates load and drying it flat. It turns out great and soft. I will soon get another to alternate between them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases were thin, wrinkled a lot & did not keep us cool. The quality of the Much cheaper ones I’ve had for years is better.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and looks nice. The biggest problem is that the case does not stay in place. The envelope flap does not stay closed therefore the pillow comes out and the case gets all twisted. I have a case with a hidden zipper that stays in place and therefore always looks much better and is more comfortable.. This case needs a hidden zipper and it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: lion

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Lovey, Soft, Silky Pillowcase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already ordered the purple! Then, I decided I wanted a light blue one, as well!!! These pillow cases are SO soft, and silky feeling, that I like to have one pillow underneath my arms, and one underneath my hair! These pillowcases are DEFINITELY WORTH THE EXTRA MONEY!!! They help my curly hair stay so nice, come morning (I do tie my long hair back)! And... these seem like they help me fall asleep 😴 💤MUCH more quickly because they are SOOoOoo comfy and COZY!!! Highly recommended! You will NOT be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: CalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Slip brand silk pillow case
customer_reviews.text: I have the $80 slip brand silk pillow case that I am obsessed with that my boyfriend tried to steal every night when we moved in together, and I wasn’t going to let that happen. I wanted to get him one just as nice for his birthday but without spending AS much. Besides being a very slightly different shade of navy there’s no way you would be able to tell they were different brands. 100% would recommend as an alternative to the Slip brand one.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several silk pillowcases over the years, and this is the first time I have spent so much at $45.99 each. I bought one as a gift, and decided to treat myself to one since I have never tried this brand. It should have felt far superior to the cases I have purchased that were half the price. It did not. I actually prefer the softness, and coolness of the cheaper ones. I will stick with Texeresilk cases from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mind Riot

customer_reviews.title: Big price increase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 years ago for $34.99. I guess silk pillowcases are getting more popular. It’s over 40% increase in price. Isn’t that more than a bit ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: JustCallMeSis

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful company with the best products
customer_reviews.text: I called only to find out that their website is very giving when you buy their products. I bought a new silk pillowcase for myself, and my husband was amazed at the quality, so I HAD TO BUY HIM ONE. If you buy it through Amazon, and you buy multiples, don't forget to use the coupon for the discount on the second one. If you read about silk pillowcases, they are the best for your skin and even your hair. Whereas, cotton is rough, and think about how many hours you spend with your face buried in a pillow. It is no wonder this company's product was a WINNER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, great feel!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the black king size since March of 2017 and I bought another in February of 2019. You can't tell the difference between them. Excellent quality and durability. They wrinkle but that is to be expected with natural fibers. I always wash on a silk cycle with a detergent made for silk or white vinegar and hang dry. One of the best investments I've made in a good night's sleep and the health of my skin and hair. I even take these traveling because everything else feels like sandpaper since using these. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Silky
customer_reviews.text: This case was a fabulous when my daughter first started using it, but after one handwashing it became dull, a bit stiffer, and no longer smooth. She has continued to use it for a year, but it's terrible and needs to be replaced. Such a disappointment for both of us. I'm looking up this past purchase now only to be sure I don't buy this brand again. I bought myself a silk pillowcase a month prior to buying hers and mine is still shiny, smooth and soft after a year and a half worth of use. I'll be buying that brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Backstrom

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews before purchasing this pillow case. I thought some of them might be over blown but I figured I’d give it a chance. While almost $50 for a pillowcase might seem a little exorbitant, and it probably is, I am very happy with this purchase. I have curly and wavy hair, and when I would wake up in the morning it would look like who did it and ran. This is not the case now with the silk pillowcase. Also, the lines that you can sometimes have it in the morning after sleeping on a regular pillow case are no longer there. I actually think it has improved the quality of my sleep as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this pillow case. i bought her her first one 4 years ago. since then every year for Christmas i get her a new one and maybe another during the year. she is on her fifth pillow case now. pros: 100% silk soft price cons: life, we are lucky if it last 1 year without getting a hole. my wife uses the pillow every night and washes it every third day, so she is not easy on these pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: beef

customer_reviews.title: Silk is Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: They was a birthday gift and they are Super! The price is a little high but, the quality is worth the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Flanker28

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcase is well constructed, but the fabric is a much lesser quality silk than I expected for the $60 price. I wake up with imprints of wrinkles on my face and my hair is a mess! Compared to a silk pillowcase I purchased several years ago at another store (unfortunately no longer available), this pillowcase just doesn't deliver on the benefits promised for a silk pillowcase....disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BLL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but quality and size issues
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of use, the silk is slightly pulling apart and pilling. The case itself is a little too small for a standard size Casper pillow so the flap is never fully closed and bulges open. Do not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Washes Beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this silk pillowcase and been worried to wash it but today I washed it in a mesh bag and dried in a high heat dryer and it came out beautifully. I am very happy with this silk pillowcase and will buy more now that I know it washes so well.
customer_reviews.author: Ebae

customer_reviews.title: Great quality silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pillowcase since 2014 and realized it was time to get a new one. I made the mistake of buying one that was 100% silk but half the price...that was a mistake. This pillowcase was easily double the thickness and quality of the half priced pillow case. You hand wash with Woolite and hang dry and this pillowcase lasted me 6 years. Buying a new one now!
customer_reviews.author: Hello from CA

customer_reviews.title: Good HouseKeeping Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase because Good Housekeeping recommended it. It is supposed to be good for your hair and skin. So far, I’ve noticed that my hair doesn’t have that “second day smell” after sleeping on this pillowcase, which I wasn’t expecting, but really appreciate. I’ve also noticed my hair looks manageable the second day as well, but I haven’t had a blow out or anything to really test how well it keeps a style.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M

customer_reviews.title: Love the navy color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice silk pillowcase. Has an envelope flap and I prefer a zipper. Perfect color for my bedroom which is navy and white. Navy does not show any dirt?
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this satin pillowcase to help save my natural curls from going too frizzy overnight. The satin is so soft and helps my hair to stay curly in the morning. The one drawback for me is that I am always hot, especially when I sleep, and the satin is not that breathable or cool. But my curls still look good in the morning! And I love the deep purple color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Feby

customer_reviews.title: 100% BETTER THEN BLISSY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these pillow cases - my original ones were BLISSY which looked great but gradually fell apart after a few months - first it was the zippers then is was the THIN fabric. My new cases from Fishers Finery do not have zippers and are made of a quality fabric - I am thrilled!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The best silk pillowcase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased other silk pillowcases in the past but never really looked at the momme (weight of silk thread) or the quality of silk, such as Mulberry. These pillowcases check all boxes AND they’re machine washable! These are the best of the best and totally worth the price. If you’re thinking of purchasing, do your homework and you’ll find that Fishers Finery 100% Pure Mulberry Silk pillowcases are simply awesome!
customer_reviews.author: san50

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a silk pillowcase before and this is amazing! It feels so smooth and silky (pardon the pun!). I put it in a laundry bag, washed it on cold water setting and hung it to dry and it came out great. I'm very happy with my purchase. Oh, and my hair was so much smoother this morning. Won't be using anything else in the future. I will also get one to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley, CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillowcase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillowcase. I get sores on my ear cartilage when I sleep with cotton pillowcases. The sores have completely gone away since I stated using this silk one. I purchased a standard size for a standard pillow but would get the queen size next time. Standard gaps in the back on my pillow, otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine R

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful company with the best products
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing. The products are equally fantastic. I bought two. After receiving the pillowcase, my husband wanted one as well. They are truly better for your skin and hair, slow the wrinkles down if you care, and you must go to the company website as they have great offers and ways for you to participate with future purchases. I will be buying a third one any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality silk
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the silk, though it is not as smooth as I expected. It should be ironed, but I don't bother with that. My one complaint is that the pillowcase is too big, because there was no "standard" option. Since I wanted the 25mm momme, I just tolerate that the case is too big for the pillow and because of the envelope-style closure, it's a little unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: PKR

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Great *affordable silk pillow case. I say affordable because I’ve looked around at other department stores for this type of pillow case and I see prices of $80- 100. And while I do not know if there is a big difference in feel, I do know this one is extremely soft and comfortable. I have very fine, chemically treated hair so when I use a cotton pillow case my hair feels and looks like hay (like for horses) in the morning. With this pillow case, I hardly even need to brush it when I wake up. It also stays cool and dry all night long. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Silk Benefits
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow case!! Ordered for the hair and skin benefits as well as hearing about how cool it stayed. It's silky soft and my hair and face glide right on to it. I have even been sleeping better at night. Now I want to order an entire sheet set of silk... I wanted to feel this prior to ordering more but I think I'm going to buy more soon and take with me when I travel and also to give as gifts. I will never sleep on a cotton pillow case again, my aunt years ago used silk and now I see why!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It does wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: It wrinkles after two washes the color fades the material is not as good as they claim. I wanted a good pair of pillow covers. Not these. I wish they could send me a good pair that last after 2 washes.
customer_reviews.author: mar G

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have a few silk pillowcases and I was looking forward to this one since it was backed by good housekeeping. It’s nice, a bit oversized and the quality seems fine, I’ve only had it for a month so no issues. I wish it had a hidden zipper instead of the flap because it moves around and isn’t as fitting as I’d like.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this pillowcase and was very excited to receive it. The silk seems like a nice quality but the pillowcase does not deliver what was promsed. It doesn't stay any cooler than my cotton pillowcases. I still find myself flipping it for the "cool side" Also, it promised to keep your hairstyle but sadly, it does not! It's pretty and nice fabric but save your money if you wanted it to keep you hair nice or you want a pillow case that stays cool. It doesn't deliver
customer_reviews.author: mm & gw

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing frizz but may loose luster after washing
customer_reviews.text: I believe the hype - this is great for hair and skin, especially if you have frizzy curly hair! The downside is that I hand washed with woolite (hang dried) but accidentally used warm instead of cold water and the silk definitely lost some of its softness.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah Ragab

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought this was a pack of two pillowcases so I have to say I think it is over priced. However I do really like the product. My hairdresser recommended it to keep my hair from flattening out. There are many of these on the market at a cheeper price so not sure I would make the same selection now that I know it is for one pillowcase. I should have read more closely.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Persinger

customer_reviews.title: No Wrinkles, I'm In!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a lover of this 25mm 100% Pure Mulberry Silk! I know what 25mm means and this detail is important to me! I got the baby blue shade and it is just perfectly soft! I have it over a Contoured Pillow to support my neck! I cant sleep on anything else now. I guess I wish there was a standard size that would fit that kind of pillow because it is a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! Like it better than other nice silk pillowcases that I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price! Like it better than other nice silk pillowcases that I have tried. It is very soft and smooth and has a better feel than other brands of silk pillowcases at a comparable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mollman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold up. Followed washing instructions to a T. It just doesn’t hold up and isn’t nice. I’ve been using it every other time I make my bed (two sets of sheets) for 9 months now and it’s gross and nappy and I’m ready to toss it. Do yourself a favor and spend a few more dollars and buy an actually nice silk pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDogLady

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm  did not feel particularly cool to the touch - and standard size seemed small to me
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty decent pillows not oversized but good quality - the standard size cases don't cover the pillow fully, and to the touch I didn't notice the cool feeling I'm looking for as I tend to sleep hot - but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissaponted with the purchase. It has only been 3 months and one of my pillow case has a hole and the other is appearing translucent at the seams. I have been following care instructions and using a very gentle detergent. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love these for my pillow
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I waited so late in life to purchase silk pillowcase. I love this pillowcase. I love that my hair is not breaking as much and I seem to sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Quality Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I think this pillow case is quality. I would be happier if it had a zipper because of its texture. I find zippers to keep the pillow in pillow case. I did purchase a 22MM pillow case from Taft, and I doing that to be just as soft, so I’m not sure if the quality is consistent with its 25MM labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Te’a

customer_reviews.title: Not really big enough
customer_reviews.text: These cases seem to be made of quality material and are soft and silky to the touch but not big enough to fit a standard pillow. The pillow fits into the case but bulges ouT the opening and leaves no space for the pillow to expand when you lie on it making your pillow much firmer than it really is. If the case was just a slight bit larger it would be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: lechenimmy

customer_reviews.title: Still smooth after wash!
customer_reviews.text: It's not as silky and buttery as I would imagine it to be but I never touched the $90+ ones so I wouldn't know how it compares lol. So for the price, I'd say it's a good deal. I was a bit worried because a lot of people say it looses its silkiness after wash but for me, it's still as smooth as the day I opened it (conditioner and ironing helps). I washed and traveled with it several times already and the seams didn't come apart yet so I'd say the durability is there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Case Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The pillow case had a small tear which has become larger. I don't know the properies of silk but this silk is easily ripping into a larger hole as if the material is rotten.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: A must for beauty sleep
customer_reviews.text: A must buy for anyone wanting to sleep in luxury. It is very easy to clean and care for. You definately want to try this takes beauty sleep to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Digby

customer_reviews.title: Rough
customer_reviews.text: Very rough and scratchy out of the package. A little better after washing but it sticks to and pulls on the skin anytime I try to move during the night. Just not comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled mess
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, but even hand washing and rolling in a towel carefully they wrinkle terribly!!! Must be ironed carefully with a really good steam iron.
customer_reviews.author: s.c.moore

product_meta.title: Fishers Finery 25mm 100% Pure Mulberry Silk Pillowcase Good Housekeeping Winner (Lt Blue, King)
feature_bullets: Good Housekeeping Tried and Tested: The experts at Good Housekeeping Magazine have labeled our 19 Momme 100% Pure Mulberry Silk Pillowcase a "Winner" and "All-Star Standout".

Luxurious Bedding: Our pillowcase is made of 100% long strand, Grade 6A Pure Mulberry Silk. There is silk on BOTH sides of the pillowcase! The density of silk is measured by momme. The higher the momme, the more silk. We have added a unique side entry that is slightly offset. The pillowcase can be used as both a sham or pillowcase. An oversized, envelope flap ensures the pillow will remain securely inside your pillowcase.
Easy Care Instructions: Dry clean or hand wash are the best methods. You can also machine wash on the gentle cycle. We suggest to use a mesh wash bag when do so. Lay flat to dry.

Variety of Colors and Sizes: We offer a wide range of colors. Choose from: White, Light Blue, Light Green, Silver, English Rose, Deep Lavender, Burgundy, Taupe, Black, Navy or Hunter Green. Our pillowcase comes in Queen and King sizes. We are now offering our White pillowcase in Standard size! Our Queen pillowcase measures 20" x 30", Standard measures 20" x 26" and King measures 20" x 36".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars40 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
